subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Gianfranco Zola is visibly transformed from a player whose impish skills and irrepressible joy could ignite a whole team, into someone so burdened by management that he grows more gaunt by the week.
snippet: Gianfranco Zola is visibly transformed from a player whose impish skills and irrepressible joy could ignite a whole team, into someone so burdened by management that he grows more gaunt by the week.
